data.message: Why did you change the way groups show up on the left side of the screen?   I LIKED having a list of my groups there.   Now it's a giant pain to get to groups.   :(

replies.message: We're sorry you feel that way, Cici. We're constantly working to improve the Facebook experience for everyone and if there's something we can do to improve yours, please let us know at: http://bit.ly/2s1EDUW. -Jessica

Facebook - Please fix the problem with having to hide notifications from my News Feed over and over and over and over and over and over and over. I reported this more than A YEAR AGO (February 9, 2016), and I still hide things, only to have them reappear the next time I reload the page. I hide them, again. They reappear... again. I hide them, AGAIN. THEY REAPPEAR... AGAIN!!! ARGH!
